ClusterCloudWatch.description: contains config parameters related to CloudWatch
ClusterCloudWatch.x-intellij-html-description: contains config parameters related to CloudWatch

enableTypes.description: Types of logging to enable (see [CloudWatch docs](/usage/cloudwatch-cluster-logging/#clusterconfig-examples)). Valid entries are: `"api"`, `"audit"`, `"authenticator"`, `"controllerManager"`, `"scheduler"`.
enableTypes.x-intellij-html-description: Types of logging to enable (see CloudWatch docs). Valid entries are: "api", "audit", "authenticator", "controllerManager", "scheduler".

ClusterCloudWatchLogging.description: container config parameters related to cluster logging
ClusterCloudWatchLogging.x-intellij-html-description: container config parameters related to cluster logging

privateCluster.description: allows configuring a fully-private cluster in which no node has outbound internet access, and private access to AWS services is enabled via VPC endpoints
privateCluster.x-intellij-html-description: allows configuring a fully-private cluster in which no node has outbound internet access, and private access to AWS services is enabled via VPC endpoints

ClusterConfig.description: a simple config, to be replaced with Cluster API
ClusterConfig.x-intellij-html-description: a simple config, to be replaced with Cluster API

ClusterEndpoints.description: holds cluster api server endpoint access information
ClusterEndpoints.x-intellij-html-description: holds cluster api server endpoint access information

fargatePodExecutionRoleARN.description: role used by pods to access AWS APIs. This role is added to the Kubernetes RBAC for authorization. See [Pod Execution Role](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eks/latest/userguide/pod-execution-role.html)
fargatePodExecutionRoleARN.x-intellij-html-description: role used by pods to access AWS APIs. This role is added to the Kubernetes RBAC for authorization. See Pod Execution Role

fargatePodExecutionRolePermissionsBounda.description: permissions boundary for the fargate pod execution role`. See [EKS Fargate Support](/usage/fargate-support/)
fargatePodExecutionRolePermissionsBounda.x-intellij-html-description: permissions boundary for the fargate pod execution role`. See EKS Fargate Support

serviceAccounts.description: service accounts to create in the cluster. See [IAM Service Accounts](/iamserviceaccounts/#usage-with-config-files)
serviceAccounts.x-intellij-html-description: service accounts to create in the cluster. See IAM Service Accounts

serviceRolePermissionsBoundary.description: permissions boundary for all identity-based entities created by eksctl. See [AWS Permission Boundary](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/access_policies_boundaries.html)
serviceRolePermissionsBoundary.x-intellij-html-description: permissions boundary for all identity-based entities created by eksctl. See AWS Permission Boundary

ClusterIAM.description: holds all IAM attributes of a cluster
ClusterIAM.x-intellij-html-description: holds all IAM attributes of a cluster

attachPolicy.description: holds a policy document to attach to this service account
attachPolicy.x-intellij-html-description: holds a policy document to attach to this service account

attachPolicyARNs.description: list of ARNs of the IAM policies to attach
attachPolicyARNs.x-intellij-html-description: list of ARNs of the IAM policies to attach

permissionsBoundary.description: ARN of the permissions boundary to associate with the service account
permissionsBoundary.x-intellij-html-description: ARN of the permissions boundary to associate with the service account

tags.description: AWS tags for the service account
tags.x-intellij-html-description: AWS tags for the service account

ClusterIAMServiceAccount.description: holds an IAM service account metadata and configuration
ClusterIAMServiceAccount.x-intellij-html-description: holds an IAM service account metadata and configuration

ClusterIAMServiceAccountStatus.description: holds status of the IAM service account
ClusterIAMServiceAccountStatus.x-intellij-html-description: holds status of the IAM service account

gateway.description: Valid variants are: `"HighlyAvailable"` configures a highly available NAT gateway, `"Single"` configures a single NAT gateway (default), `"Disable"` disables NAT.
gateway.x-intellij-html-description: Valid variants are: "HighlyAvailable" configures a highly available NAT gateway, "Single" configures a single NAT gateway (default), "Disable" disables NAT.

ClusterStatus.description: hold read-only attributes of a cluster
ClusterStatus.x-intellij-html-description: hold read-only attributes of a cluster

autoAllocateIPv6.description: AutoAllocateIPV6 requests an IPv6 CIDR block with /56 prefix for the VPC
autoAllocateIPv6.x-intellij-html-description: AutoAllocateIPV6 requests an IPv6 CIDR block with /56 prefix for the VPC

extraCIDRs.description: for additional CIDR associations, e.g. a CIDR for private subnets or any ad-hoc subnets
extraCIDRs.x-intellij-html-description: for additional CIDR associations, e.g. a CIDR for private subnets or any ad-hoc subnets

publicAccessCIDRs.description: which CIDR blocks to allow access to public k8s API endpoint
publicAccessCIDRs.x-intellij-html-description: which CIDR blocks to allow access to public k8s API endpoint

securityGroup.description: for communication between control plane and nodes
securityGroup.x-intellij-html-description: for communication between control plane and nodes

subnets.description: keyed by AZ for convenience. See [this example](/examples/reusing-iam-and-vpc/) as well as [using existing VPCs](/usage/vpc-networking/#use-existing-vpc-any-custom-configuration).
subnets.x-intellij-html-description: keyed by AZ for convenience. See this example as well as using existing VPCs.

ClusterVPC.description: holds global subnet and all child subnets
ClusterVPC.x-intellij-html-description: holds global subnet and all child subnets

podExecutionRoleARN.description: IAM role's ARN to use to run pods onto Fargate.
podExecutionRoleARN.x-intellij-html-description: IAM role's ARN to use to run pods onto Fargate.

selectors.description: define the rules to select workload to schedule onto Fargate.
selectors.x-intellij-html-description: define the rules to select workload to schedule onto Fargate.

subnets.description: which Fargate should use to do network placement of the selected workload. If none provided, all subnets for the cluster will be used.
subnets.x-intellij-html-description: which Fargate should use to do network placement of the selected workload. If none provided, all subnets for the cluster will be used.

tags.description: Used to tag the AWS resources
tags.x-intellij-html-description: Used to tag the AWS resources

FargateProfile.description: defines the settings used to schedule workload onto Fargate.
FargateProfile.x-intellij-html-description: defines the settings used to schedule workload onto Fargate.

labels.description: Kubernetes label selectors to use to select workload.
labels.x-intellij-html-description: Kubernetes label selectors to use to select workload.

namespace.description: Kubernetes namespace from which to select workload.

FargateProfileSelector.description: defines rules to select workload to schedule onto Fargate.
FargateProfileSelector.x-intellij-html-description: defines rules to select workload to schedule onto Fargate.

Git.description: groups all configuration options related to enabling GitOps on a cluster and linking it to a Git repository. [Gitops Guide](/gitops-quickstart/)
Git.x-intellij-html-description: groups all configuration options related to enabling GitOps on a cluster and linking it to a Git repository. Gitops Guide

InlineDocument.x-intellij-html-description: holds any arbitrary JSON/YAML documents, such as extra config parameters or IAM policies

version.description: Launch template version Defaults to the default launch template version TODO support $Default, $Latest

disableIMDSv1.x-intellij-html-description: requires requests to the metadata service to use IMDSv2 tokens

launchTemplate.description: specifies an existing launch template to use for the nodegroup
launchTemplate.x-intellij-html-description: specifies an existing launch template to use for the nodegroup

preBootstrapCommands.description: executed before bootstrapping instances to the cluster
preBootstrapCommands.x-intellij-html-description: executed before bootstrapping instances to the cluster

ssh.description: configures ssh access for this nodegroup
ssh.x-intellij-html-description: configures ssh access for this nodegroup

ssh.description: configures ssh access for this nodegroup

targetGroupARNs.description: Associate target group with auto scaling group
targetGroupARNs.x-intellij-html-description: Associate target group with auto scaling group

NodeGroup.description: holds configuration attributes that are specific to a nodegroup
NodeGroup.x-intellij-html-description: holds configuration attributes that are specific to a nodegroup

NodeGroupBottlerocket.description: holds the configuration for Bottlerocket based NodeGroups.
NodeGroupBottlerocket.x-intellij-html-description: holds the configuration for Bottlerocket based NodeGroups.

NodeGroupIAM.description: holds all IAM attributes of a NodeGroup
NodeGroupIAM.x-intellij-html-description: holds all IAM attributes of a NodeGroup

NodeGroupInstancesDistribution.x-intellij-html-description: holds the configuration for spot instances

attachIDs.description: attaches additional security groups to the nodegroup
attachIDs.x-intellij-html-description: attaches additional security groups to the nodegroup

withLocal.description: attach a security group local to this nodegroup Not supported for managed nodegroups
withLocal.x-intellij-html-description: attach a security group local to this nodegroup Not supported for managed nodegroups

withShared.description: attach the security group shared among all nodegroups in the cluster
withShared.x-intellij-html-description: attach the security group shared among all nodegroups in the cluster

NodeGroupSGs.description: controls security groups for this nodegroup
NodeGroupSGs.x-intellij-html-description: controls security groups for this nodegroup

NodeGroupSSH.x-intellij-html-description: holds all the ssh access configuration to a NodeGroup

commitOperatorManifests.description: Commit and push Flux manifests to the Git Repo on install
commitOperatorManifests.x-intellij-html-description: Commit and push Flux manifests to the Git Repo on install

label.description: Git label to keep track of Flux's sync progress; this is equivalent to overriding --git-sync-tag and --git-notes-ref in Flux
label.x-intellij-html-description: Git label to keep track of Flux's sync progress; this is equivalent to overriding --git-sync-tag and --git-notes-ref in Flux

namespace.description: Cluster namespace where to install Flux and the Helm Operator e.g. flux
namespace.x-intellij-html-description: Cluster namespace where to install Flux and the Helm Operator e.g. flux

readOnly.description: Instruct Flux to read-only mode and create the deploy key as read-only
readOnly.x-intellij-html-description: Instruct Flux to read-only mode and create the deploy key as read-only

Operator.description: groups all configuration options related to the operator used to keep the cluster and the Git repository in sync.
Operator.x-intellij-html-description: groups all configuration options related to the operator used to keep the cluster and the Git repository in sync.

additionalEndpointServices.description: specifies additional endpoint services that must be enabled for private access. Valid entries are: `"cloudformation"`, `"autoscaling"`, `"logs"`.
additionalEndpointServices.x-intellij-html-description: specifies additional endpoint services that must be enabled for private access. Valid entries are: "cloudformation", "autoscaling", "logs".

enabled.description: enables creation of a fully-private cluster
enabled.x-intellij-html-description: enables creation of a fully-private cluster

PrivateCluster.description: defines the configuration for a fully-private cluster
PrivateCluster.x-intellij-html-description: defines the configuration for a fully-private cluster

outputPath.description: Output directory for the processed profile templates (generate profile command)
outputPath.x-intellij-html-description: Output directory for the processed profile templates (generate profile command)

revision.description: of the Quick Start profile. Can be a branch, tag or commit hash
revision.x-intellij-html-description: of the Quick Start profile. Can be a branch, tag or commit hash

source.description: Name or URL of the Quick Start profile
source.x-intellij-html-description: Name or URL of the Quick Start profile

Profile.description: groups all details on a quickstart profile to enable on the cluster and add to the Git repository.
Profile.x-intellij-html-description: groups all details on a quickstart profile to enable on the cluster and add to the Git repository.

branch.description: The git branch under which cluster configuration files will be committed & pushed, e.g. master
branch.x-intellij-html-description: The git branch under which cluster configuration files will be committed & pushed, e.g. master

email.description: Git email which will be used to commit changes
email.x-intellij-html-description: Git email which will be used to commit changes

fluxPath.description: The directory under which Flux configuration files will be written, e.g. flux/
fluxPath.x-intellij-html-description: The directory under which Flux configuration files will be written, e.g. flux/

paths.description: Relative paths within the Git repository which the GitOps operator will monitor to find Kubernetes manifests to apply, e.g. ["kube-system", "base"]
paths.x-intellij-html-description: Relative paths within the Git repository which the GitOps operator will monitor to find Kubernetes manifests to apply, e.g. ["kube-system", "base"]

privateSSHKeyPath.description: Path to the private SSH key to use to authenticate
privateSSHKeyPath.x-intellij-html-description: Path to the private SSH key to use to authenticate

url.description: The Git SSH URL to the repository which will contain the cluster configuration
url.x-intellij-html-description: The Git SSH URL to the repository which will contain the cluster configuration

user.description: Git user which will be used to commit changes
user.x-intellij-html-description: Git user which will be used to commit changes

Repo.description: groups all configuration options related to a Git repository used for GitOps.
Repo.x-intellij-html-description: groups all configuration options related to a Git repository used for GitOps.

SecretsEncryption.x-intellij-html-description: defines the configuration for KMS encryption provider
